item.description:
Chak de Boston!!  Get ready!!! Boston's biggest bhangra party this year is here!  GenerationDesi.com presents Paisa Paisa Dance Party and Live Concert on June 8th.   Superstar celebrity Manak-E from UK, is here to party with all you Bostonians!  His US tour in San Fransico, Chicago and Boston!  We bring you UK's Bhangra King Manak-E who most recent hit "Paisa Paisa" has been incorporated into the Bollywood Blockbuster movie "De Dana Dan" and picturized on Akshay Khanna and Katrina Kaif.  The Man Behind Dhoor, Ni Kulne, Hor Glassy, Paisa Paisa, & More..Along with Manak-E we bring you UK's best DJ Hari-B to rock you all night long along with DJ Hiti.

This is a different concept with live performance by celebrity superstar artist Manak-E with the biggest baddest Bhangra/Bollywood Party.   Two floors - lots of space and 1 big party!

Two additional information points:   For all you beer lovers, the venue has an excellent selection with over 100 beers on tap.  Also, we are adding a live fashion show as well.

Ticketing information:
http://www.GenerationDesi.com
https://www.desiclub.com/shop/cart/ticket_purchase.cfm?eventID=12297
http://mycity.sulekha.com/manake-live-in-boston_event-in_brighton-ma_276773
item.name: Paisa Paisa Bhangra Party
